values: Why We Need a Savior: Captive to an Alien Power, by Nature Children of WrathWhy We Need a Savior: Captive to an Alien Power, by Nature Children of Wrath

We were dead to God, enslaved to Satan, and were rightfully under the wrath of God. There was only one hope, and it was not in ourselves. We were dead to God, enslaved to Satan, and were rightfully under the wrath of God. There was only one hope, and it was not in ourselves.
